welcome_message_body: Welcome to Winnersh, a charming town in the heart of the United Kingdom known for its beautiful scenery and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Blackbushe Airport handles all commercial flights and is equipped with modern amenities for passenger convenience.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Blackbushe Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Farnborough Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Farnborough Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's WiFi network for free.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Benson Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Benson Airport is used exclusively for military operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lasham Airport handles all commercial flights and is equipped with modern facilities for passenger convenience.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lasham Airport is used for shipping and receiving of goods and is equipped with state-of-the-art equipment for efficient handling.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers to use.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving primarily domestic and European flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving primarily international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The busiest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving a mix of domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly long-haul flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving a mix of domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, with a 45-minute time limit per session.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northolt Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
